price: 104. Waa kuwaa camalkooda noloshan adduunka yahay khasaaro aan wax qiimo ah laheyn iyagoo mooda inay sama falaan?
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ضَلَّ سَعۡيُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ يُحۡسِنُونَ صُنۡعًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ḍalla saʿyuhum fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wahum yaḥsabūna annahum yuḥ'sinūna ṣun'ʿan
